fields.description:
iOS6 camera has the capability to take panoramic pictures. Enable panoramic view in options of iOS 6 camera to take pictures in panoramic view.

Customer has requested to implement the options in camera view which enables taking pics in panoramic view.
fields.summary: iOS : Request to add feature to Camera API which enabled to take panoramic pictures in iOS6
